expo.name: Beta Log
expo.description: Track climbing workouts, hangboard sessions, and record beta videos. Log exercises, save timer presets, and review your training history â€” all stored locally on your device.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Beta Log needs camera access to record climbing videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Beta Log needs microphone access to record audio with climbing videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Beta Log needs photo library access to save recorded climbing videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Beta Log needs camera access to record climbing videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Beta Log needs microphone access to record audio with climbing videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Beta Log needs photo library access to view your climbing videos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Beta Log needs photo library access to save recorded climbing videos.
